name: vidcat
description: vidcat simplifies video editing for hobbyists and casual users by providing a user-friendly application to merge multiple video clips into a single continuous file. This project is especially valuable for drone enthusiasts and amateur videographers who face the challenge of handling video files that are automatically split by devices like the DJI Mini 4 Pro. With EZmerge, merging video clips is quick, easy, and doesnâ€™t require the complex features of professional editing software.

scripts.install: npm install bulma@1.0.1 electron@31.0.2 express@4.19.2 ffmpeg-static@5.2.0 ffprobe-static@3.1.0 fluent-ffmpeg@2.1.3

author: CS3398 G4
